solution_line_template: If there are a hundred ladies in the living room and three times that many girls at the party, there are {multiplier_party}*{ladies_first_floor}=<<{multiplier_party}*{ladies_first_floor}={girls_at_party}>>{girls_at_party} girls at the party.
In the building there are {ladies_first_floor}+{girls_at_party}=<<{ladies_first_floor}+{girls_at_party}={total_ladies}>>{total_ladies} ladies.
